description: Updates information about the billing group. Requires permission to access the UpdateBillingGroup action.

parameters.name: billingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the billing group.

parameters.name: billingGroupProperties
parameters.description: The properties of the billing group. billingGroupDescription (string) --- The description of the billing group.

nested_params.name: billingGroupDescription
nested_params.description: The description of the billing group.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The latest version of the billing group.
